Text: Thanks for this,some excellent titles, a couple are hard to find now.

I downloaded this for y'all, I'm just that kind of person. 

Here's the skinny, the docs are: 

The Filth and the Fury (2000)
The Year Punk Broke (1992)
Another State of Mind (2004)
Punk Attitude (2005)
DOA: A Right of Passage (1980)
Let Them Know: The Story of Youth Brigade (2009)
Punk Attitude (2005)

ywia, now lets PUNK out, punk rockers! Spike your hair with vaseline, throw on your Doc Martens and stick a safety pin through your sack  , somebodys gonna get their head kicked in tonight!!!!!!!
